member.name: CERT_SIMPLE_CHAIN
member.summary: The CERT_SIMPLE_CHAIN structure contains an array of chain elements and a summary trust status for the chain that the array represents.

member.name: CERT_SIMPLE_CHAIN.cbSize
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of this structure.

member.name: CERT_SIMPLE_CHAIN.TrustStatus
member.summary: A structure that indicates the trust status of the whole chain. The structure includes an error status code and an information status code. For information about status code values, see .

member.name: CERT_SIMPLE_CHAIN.cElement
member.summary: The number of structures in the array.

member.name: CERT_SIMPLE_CHAIN.rgpElement
member.summary: An array of pointers to structures. rgpElement[0] is the end certificate chain element. rgpElement[cElement–1] is the self-signed "root" certificate element.

member.name: CERT_SIMPLE_CHAIN.pTrustListInfo
member.summary: A pointer to a structure that contains a pointer to a certificate trust list (CTL) connecting this chain to a next certificate chain. If the current chain is the final chain, pTrustListInfo is NULL.

member.name: CERT_SIMPLE_CHAIN.fHasRevocationFreshnessTime
member.summary: BOOL. If TRUE, dwRevocationFreshnessTime has been calculated.

member.name: CERT_SIMPLE_CHAIN.dwRevocationFreshnessTime
member.summary: The age of a certificate revocation list(CRL) in seconds, calculated as the CurrentTime minus the CRL's ThisUpdate time. This values is the largest time across all elements checked.
